Episodes.Title: Four Months Later...
Episodes.Plot: Four months after the events of the showdown between Sylar and Peter, new Heroes emerge. These include brother and sister Alejandro and Maya. Hiro remains in the past, but what will come of this? Someone dies and someone isn't dead. Claire and her father and the rest of their family get a new life.
Episodes.GuestStars: Adetokumboh M'Cormack, Lisa Cohen, Casey Washington, Mark Colson, Kiko Kiko, Milos Milicevic, Rene L. Moreno, Dianna Agron, David Anders, Lyndsy Fonseca, Sara Solomon, Barry Shabaka Henley, Lauren Stamile, Brian K

Episodes.Title: Lizards
Episodes.Plot: Peter falls in with Irish gangsters who know about his past. Hiro works to contain the damage caused by his journey into the past. Kensei's power will be revealed. Suresh locates and cures the Haitian. Matt investigates the murder of Mr. Nakamura. West comes to know of Claire's powers. Maya and Alejandro enter Mexico and find their powers more of a hindrance than a help.
Episodes.GuestStars: Yareli Arizmendi, Ivonne Coll, David Anders, Barry Shabaka Henley, Dominic Keating, Holt McCallany, Dianna Agron

Episodes.Title: Kindred
Episodes.Plot: Suresh finds an undiscovered Isaac Mendez painting that shows someone's death; Maya frees Alejandro from a Mexican jail; in the past Hiro discovers something new about Kensei; and Niki and Micah leave Las Vegas to get away from their past. Claire and West take a little trip.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Anders, Barry Shabaka Henley, Dominic Keating, Holt McCallany, Nichelle Nichols, TW Leshner, Dianna Agron, Hector Luis Bustamante, Adetokumboh M'Cormack, Mark Colson, Roberto Medina, Steven C. Gibbons, Kevi

Episodes.Title: The Kindness of Strangers
Episodes.Plot: Monica starts to exhibit new abilities while working with Micah, Nana, and Damon. Nana is the grandmother of Micah, Monica, and Damon. They all currently reside in New Orleans. Matt asks Molly to locate the man in her dreams. He may be the newest threat to the Heroes. Maya and Alejandro continue their trek to the U.S. Both Claire and her father are suspicious of one another. Angela reveals a lot of her secrets.
Episodes.GuestStars: Nichelle Nichols, Carlon Jeffrey, Mark Christopher Lawrence, Barry Shabaka Henley, TW Leshner, Jeanette Brox, Janel Parrish

Episodes.Title: Fight or Flight
Episodes.Plot: A woman named Elle is searching for Peter. Ando looks for Hiro in the past. Matt looks for the man in Molly's dreams. HRG takes another step in hopes of protecting his family and himself.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jeanette Brox, Nichelle Nichols, Holt McCallany, Dominic Keating, Alan Blumenfeld

Episodes.Title: The Line
Episodes.Plot: Peter goes on a search. West convinces Claire to stand up to someone. Hiro struggles with his feelings for Yaeko. Suresh has more problems with the Company. HRG tries to locate more of Isaac's paintings. Alejandro doesn't trust Sylar.
Episodes.Writer: Adam Armus, Kay Foster, Tim Kring
Episodes.GuestStars: Dianna Agron, Elya Baskin, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Janel Parrish

Episodes.Title: Out of Time
Episodes.Plot: Peter and Caitlin learn about the endstage effects of the Heroes virus. Many of the Heroes work together to fight the Nightmare Man.  West is shocked to the identity of Claire's father.  Hiro and Kensei's journey comes to an end.
Episodes.GuestStars: Alan Blumenfeld, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Mark Harelik, Kenji Nakamura, Timon Kyle Durrett

Episodes.Title: Four Months Ago...
Episodes.Plot: The events of the "missing four months" are explored. Maya and Alejandro must go on the run, it is explained how Peter ended up in Ireland and what happened to Nathan, Nikki, and D.L.

Episodes.Title: Cautionary Tales
Episodes.Plot: Mr. Bennet prepares to move his family when he thinks the Company has found them, but Claire doesn't like the idea. Hiro returns to the present and upon discovering his father's death, travels back in time to stop it. Meanwhile, Matt works to master his new mental abilities.

Episodes.Title: Truth & Consequences
Episodes.Plot: Peter travels to Primatech in Texas to destroy the virus, but not everything is what it seems. Hiro continues the pursuit of his father's killer, while Matt pursues the last Company member in the photo. Nikki is reunited with Micah but has bad news, while Maya has to choose to remain with Alejandro, or go with Sylar.
Episodes.GuestStars: Stephen Tobolowsky (Bob), Joanna Cassidy (Victoria Pratt), Ashley Crow (Sandra Bennet), Nicholas D'agosto (West Rosen), Shalim Ortiz (Alejandro Herrera), Jaime Ray Newman (Victoria Pratt), Eijiro Ozaki (Kai

Episodes.Title: Powerless
Episodes.Plot: In Texas, Peter faces off against former friends due to Adam?s misleading story about the Shanti virus. Micah enlists the help of his mother to rescue Monica. Maya is shocked when she learns the truth about her new friend Sylar. Elle tries to make her father proud.
